author: Special Correspondent
text:
P. Vimalan, Director, SRC Projects Private Limited, has been nominated as the Chairman of the Confederation of Indian Industry (CII), Salem District Council for 2016-17, at the Salem District annual session held here on Saturday.

Mr. Vimalan was the vice-chairman of CII Salem last year and was actively involved in various initiatives of the CII. He holds a bachelor’s degree in mechanical engineering from PSG College of Technology, Coimbatore. He was the convener of the infrastructure, Minerals and Tourism Panel of CII Salem during 2013-14 and 2014-15.

S. S. Yuvaraj, Chief Executive, SS Fabrics Mill, was nominated as the vice-chairman, CII Salem.

He headed the MSME and Manufacturing Panel of CII Salem in the last two years. Prior to that, he was co-convener of the same panel for 2012-13 and 2013-14. He actively participated in the Manufacturing Sub Committee in state level activities.
